text: He loka tumhala kayamatavisayi vicaratata ki ti kevha ye'ila? Tumhi sanga ki yace jnana phakta majhya palanakartyalaca ahe. Tila ticya velevara, allahakherija dusara koni jahira karanara nahi. Ti akasanci va jaminici phara mothi (ghatana) asela. Ti tumacyavara acanaka ye'una kosalela. Te tumhala asa prakare vicaratata, janu kahi tumhi tica sodha ghe'una basalata. Tumhi sanga, tice jnana visesaritya allahajavala ahe, parantu bahuteka loka janata nahita
